CFB Conference Information

cfb_conferences.Rd

Pulls all college football conferences and returns as data frame the following fields:

cfb_conferences()

Source

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/conferences

Value

A data frame with 11 rows and 4 variables:

conference_id

Referencing conference id

name

Conference name

long_name

Long name for Conference

abbreviation

Conference abbreviation

...

Examples


cfb_conferences()

#>    conference_id              name
#> 1              1               ACC
#> 2              4            Big 12
#> 3              5           Big Ten
#> 4              8               SEC
#> 5              9            Pac-12
#> 6             12    Conference USA

#> 8             17     Mountain West
#> 9             18  FBS Independents
